path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 14px; paint-order: fill; fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0);

line.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 11px; stroke-linecap: square;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 11px; stroke-linecap: square;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 11px; stroke-linecap: square;

polyline.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-width: 11px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: square;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 11px; stroke-linecap: square;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 48px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 48px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 67.9216% -87.7302%;
